text: Video games are electronic games that involve interaction with a user interface. Video Games may also refer to: * Video Games: The Movie, a 2014 documentary film by Jeremy Snead * VideoGames & Computer Entertainment, later VideoGames - The Ultimate Gaming Magazine, a defunct American periodical * "Video Games" (song), by Lana Del Rey, 2011 * "Video Games", a 1980 song by Ronnie Jones ==See also== * Video Games Live, a concert series created by Tommy Tallarico
title: Video Games (disambiguation)
